content: It is sickness to be obsessed with winning, it is sickness to be obsessed with using the martial arts, and it is sickness to be obsessed with putting forth all one has learned. It is sickness to be obsessed with offense, and it is also sickness to be obsessed with defense. It is also sickness to be obsessed with getting rid of sickness. To fix the mind obsessively on anything is considered sickness.
translations: ita:È malattia essere ossessionati dalla vittoria, è malattia essere ossessionati dall'utilizzo delle arti marziali, ed è ma
